text:
System:  Windows 2000
Ant 1.6alpha

Ant delete task does not seem to be deleting files which do not have an extension on Windows 2000:

Steps to recreate:
Create any two files, one with any extension, and one file which has no extension at all.  Then include the run the following task:

<delete failonerror="false" verbose="true" >
  <fileset dir="adir" includes="**/*"/>
  <fileset dir="adir"/>
</delete>
I was trying to use **/*.* instead of **/*.
